name: Sketchsheets
description: Ready to print sketch sheet templates for UX designers
author: Mark Wilson <e@markwil.so>

scripts.start: run-s clean build && run-p watch serve
scripts.stylus: stylus dist/styles/main.styl -o dist/styles/main.css && stylus --compress dist/styles/Nanogram/nanogram.styl -o dist/styles/nanogram.min.css && rm -rf dist/styles/Nanogram && find ./dist -name '*.styl' -delete
scripts.build: ncp src dist && run-s pug stylus autoprefixer meta
